comments.author: felix engel
comments.content: Several other description (A), B), and C)) have been discussed during some of our meeting. Which description of "Demand" fits best in SC4EU? A) - Outgoing/ incoming Shipments (bound by capacity, mostly not directly forecasted, mostly historic values) B -  Outgoing (downstream)/ Incoming (upstream) Orders (already inflated and donâ€™t reflect actual sales because of order cancellations) or C) - Confirmed orders.

comments.author: felix engel
comments.content: Alternative descriptions are: A) - Can be calculated by dividing the current inventory by the average orders a day for the next months B) - Result is the reach in days (Reach, Inventory Coverage, Days of Inventory)
